response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be a valuable addition to your endeavors. I am offering this remarkable product to you for $950,000. This price reflects not only the intrinsic worth of the item but also the opportunity to secure such a high-quality asset at an advantageous rate compared to its market value of $1,200,000. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me.", "product_price": 950000}
